text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And here we are, in Sapporo City!
Hokkaido! At Odori Park!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I can't believe there's such a
vast park in the middle of the city!
The scale of the northern land is truly
impressive!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That being said, this park stretches
straight on for a long way, doesn't it…
I wonder if it's as long as a racetrack?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Hmm, I'm starting to feel like doing 
something bakushin here. 
Are there any races held in this park?!
